ed sse code in debug
                # mode. Since this is rarely going to be debugged, run with full
                # optimizations in Debug as well as Release.
                'GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL': '3',  # -O3
               },
             },
          },
        }],
        [ 'OS==\"win\"', {
          'variables': {
            'yasm_flags': [
              '-DWIN32',
              '-DMSVC',
              '-DCHROMIUM',
              '-Isimd',
            ],
          },
        }],
        [ 'OS==\"mac\"', {
          'variables': {
            'yasm_flags': [
              '-DPREFIX',
              '-DMACHO',
              '-DCHROMIUM',
              '-Isimd',
            ],
          },
        }],
        [ 'os_posix==1 and OS!=\"mac\"', {
          'variables': {
            'conditions': [
              [ 'target_arch==\"ia32\"', {
                'yasm_flags': [
                  '-DX86_32',
                  '-DELF',
                  '-DCHROMIUM',
                  '-Isimd',
                ],

                'yasm_flags': [
                  '-DARCH_X86_64',
